overview: Eddy is convinced his father’s death wasn’t an accident and sets out to find the person responsible. Leaving a trail of bodies in his wake, things go from bad to worse when they think they finally have their man and take it out on his family. Add in a few vengeful spirits for good measure and things get a little weird.
tagline: Lock the doors. Turn out the lights. Pray for a quick death.
title: Closing Time
